name: Fortune Twins
description:
A 2D Horror Game 

You play as Mei, a daughter of a poor family.

You fall ill and your family gives their all to pay the bills.

You stick together but life shows no mercy.

The truth lies within your dreams.

What is the true price you need to pay to be cured?

Game developed in RPG Maker, by students of the HAW-Hamburg. It's our first game project togheter and we are excited to show you our results. Future will be bright.

We hope you enjoy the game and uncover the story of this Game.

Team

Felix  Gieselmann (RPG Maker Lead, Game Design)

Thanh Loan Pham (Art, Game Design, Story, RPG Maker)

Francesco Vinciguerra (Story, Game Design, RPG Maker, Management)

Taymaz Khadem Saba (Music)
